name: I Wanna Destroy the Station!
description:
Feature

  • a special power up
  • 2 fast-paced bosses
  • smooth 60 fps gameplay
  • its in space

Controls

(rebindable - see controls.txt)

  • arrow key - move left and right
  • shift - jump
  • Z - shoot

(additional)

  • R - load save
  • F2 - reset to menu
  • P - pause
  • Esc - quit
  • Q - the fun button
